word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指由于某物某事某行为不能让人满意而被当面直截了当地拒绝。
指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。
指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
语气较重，指态度坚决，肯定无疑的拒绝。

word_group.brief_definition: 急速下滑；急速下降；飞速下降
急速下滑；急速下降；飞速衰退
由此下降；因而减少；从而削弱
稳步下降；稳定下降；稳步衰退
发行量下降；发行量减少

bilingual.target: 老年时，记忆力可能会有所下降。

bilingual.source: The temperature will decline rapidly after sunset.
bilingual.target: 日落后气温将迅速下降。
公司的利润每个季度都在下降。

bilingual.source: The statistics indicate a decline in the birth rate.
bilingual.target: 数据表明出生率在下降。

bilingual.source: His decline in performance worries the teachers.
bilingual.target: 他的成绩下降让老师们感到担忧。

bilingual.source: The birth rate continues to decline in many countries.
bilingual.target: 许多国家的出生率持续下降。

bilingual.source: The decline in sales was attributed to the economic downturn.
bilingual.target: 销售额的下降归因于经济衰退。

bilingual.source: His decline in performance this semester is very noticeable.
bilingual.target: 这个学期他的成绩下降得很明显。

bilingual.source: The decline in domestic demand has affected production activities.
bilingual.target: 国内需求的下降影响了生产活动。

bilingual.source: During the economic decline, consumer spending dropped significantly.
bilingual.target: 经济衰退期间，消费水平显著下降。

list.abstract: Decline（英 [dɪˈklaɪn]，美 [dɪˈklaɪn]），英语单词，作动词用，为变小；变少；减少。作名词用，为日渐衰弱；持续减少；不断下降。短语搭配有economic decline（经济衰退），例句为“The decline of Arctic ice is irreversible.（北极冰层的减少是不可逆转的。）” Decline名词类近义词有reduction、recession、fall，不及物动词类近义词有go down、slump，及物动词类近义词有excuse oneself from，相关反义词有improvement、ascent、better等。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know what I've always dreaded? The decline of the aristocracy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我一直担心的是什么吗？贵族地位的没落？

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, I am honoured by your proposal, but I regret that I must decline it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，你的求婚使我感到荣幸，可惜我除了谢绝之外，别无办法。

yingyinNormal.en: During the last decade, people thought the decline in American manufacturing was inevitable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去十年里，人们一直认为美国制造业的衰退是必然的。

yingyinNormal.en: He saw me as weak. Despite what I did, people still rumor of my decline and they worry for succession.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他就是视我为弱者，尽管我以强者的姿态做事，但大家还是散布谣言，说我日渐衰弱，说他们担心大位的继承。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, you can just hang it up by pressing the button on the side. You don't have to decline. I'm a creature of habit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你按边上的按钮就可以直接挂断。你不用拒接。我习惯了。

yingyinNormal.en: Our economy had plummeted at a rate of 8% in a single quarter part of the fastest economic decline any time in the last half century.
yingyinNormal.zh: 近一个季度的时间经济就下滑8%，这是过去半个世纪以来少有的经济下滑速度。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 下降; 减少; 衰退

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 下降; 减少; 衰退

examination_example.sentence: One study found that muscle loss and the accumulation of body fat around the abdomen are associated with a <highlight>decline</highlight> in fluid intelligence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项研究发现，肌肉萎缩和腹部脂肪堆积与流体智力下降有关。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>decline</highlight> in American manufacturing is a common refrain, particularly from Donald Trump.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国制造业的衰落是一个常见的论调，尤其是唐纳德•特朗普。

examination_example.sentence: And though print ad sales still dwarf their online and mobile counterparts, revenue from print is still <highlight>declining</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管纸质广告的销售仍然让在线和移动广告相形见绌，但纸质广告的收入仍在下降。

sense_info_list.en: to refuse politely to accept or to do something

examination_example.sentence: Microsoft <highlight>declined</highlight> to comment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 微软拒绝置评。

word_usage.usage: decline作动词表“谢绝; 婉拒”，语气比refuse“拒绝; 回绝”委婉。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“抵制；断然拒绝（某种提议、计划、观点等）”，含有断然的、坚定的意味。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Adolescent wellbeing is experiencing a <highlight>decline</highlight> and arguing that the most likely cause is the electronic riches we have given them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青少年的幸福感确实在下降，并认为最可能的原因是我们给予他们的电子财富。

examination_example.sentence: Car use is in <highlight>decline</highlight> as more people move to city centers, while young people especially are opting for other means of travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着越来越多的人搬到城市中心，汽车使用量正在下降，而年轻人尤其倾向于选择其他出行方式。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers are already asking if motor vehicle use has reached its peak and will <highlight>decline</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员已经在调查机动车辆的使用是否已达到高峰，数量是否会下降。

examination_example.sentence: For example, decreases in total emissions of pollutants and <highlight>declines</highlight> in crime rates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如减少污染物排放总量和降低犯罪率。

sense_info_list.en: politely refuse an invitation or offer

examination_example.sentence: The manufacturing sector is <highlight>declining</highlight> at a fast rate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造业正在快速衰落。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It has experienced an overall <highlight>decline</highlight> in air quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它经历了空气质量的全面下降。

examination_example.sentence: Use of electronics has also been known to lead to a <highlight>decline</highlight> in human interactions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众所周知，电子设备的使用也会导致人类互动的减少。

examination_example.sentence: What has changed, instead, is the relative share adopting different ways of living in early adulthood, with the <highlight>decline</highlight> of romantic coupling pushing living at home to the top of a much less uniform list of living arrangements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，发生改变的是年轻人不同居住安排的相对占比：浪漫关系的减少将“住在父母家”这种方式推到了一系列愈发多元化的居住安排的首位。

examination_example.sentence: French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte was known to be unimpressed by the <highlight>declining</highlight> taste of early 18th century cooking, but under pressure to entertain Paris's high society, he too called Creme to his kitchen at Tuileries Palace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众所周知法国皇帝 Napoleon Bonaparte 对18世纪初期衰退的烹饪口味并不感兴趣，但在招待巴黎上流社会的压力下，他也找 Careme 去了他在 Tuileries Palace 的厨房。

examination_example.sentence: Some of them begin to <highlight>decline</highlight> when people are still young.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些在人们还年轻的时候就开始衰退了。

examination_example.sentence: They tend to <highlight>decline</highlight> in people's later years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们往往在人们的晚年衰落。

sense_info_list.en: any disease in which bodily strength gradually fails; especially tuberculosis

examination_example.sentence: Some diseases inevitably lead to their <highlight>decline</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些疾病不可避免地导致他们的衰弱。

sense_info_list.en: politely refuse an invitation or offer

examination_example.sentence: She tried to give him money later on, but he graciously <highlight>declined</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她后来试图给他钱，但他婉言谢绝了。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指婉言谢绝他人的帮助或邀请等。
指坚决地拒绝接受、给予或承认。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: What was a cause of the waterfowl population <highlight>decline</highlight> in North America?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 北美水禽数量下降的原因是什么？

examination_example.sentence: The amount of time spent in reading each session has <highlight>declined</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读每一章节所花费的时间减少了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: However, this has led to lower water levels on the river, which has caused the river’s water to <highlight>decline</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这导致了河流的水位降低，进而导致河水减少。

examination_example.sentence: However, as years passed, Mrs. Kuroki's health began to <highlight>decline</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，随着岁月的流逝，黑木夫人的健康状况开始恶化。
